segments.text: I notice the boy is standing on that wobbly stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, and the woman is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the mother is going to be in for a big surprise when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so innocent, but she’s still part of this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the floor is going to be a slip hazard soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just chaotic, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
